sentences.en: An attempt to rescue the men has been hampered by bad weather.
sentences.cn: 对那几名男子的营救行动受到恶劣天气的阻碍。

sentences.en: Before entering the bathroom, he emptied his dirty laundry into the hamper.
sentences.cn: 进浴室前，他把脏衣服全都放进洗衣筐里。

sentences.en: Car Accessories, Tent , Beach Item, Bag, Seat Cover, Hamper, Mat Automobile Accessories.
sentences.cn: 采购产品汽车配件, 窗帘篷, 沙滩项目, 袋, 座椅的范围, 阻碍, 垫汽车配件.

sentences.en: Currently, there are many restrictions that hamper the development of multilateral trade.
sentences.cn: 目前多边贸易的广泛开展, 还有着诸多的限制.

sentences.en: Exclusive dealing and trying arrangements hamper competition in the distribution process.
sentences.cn: 排他性的交易和搭卖安排对分配过程中的竞争造成遏制作用.

sentences.en: He wanted a box and a hamper that come from Newcastle.
sentences.cn: 他要领取由新堡运来的一箱和一大篮货物.

sentences.en: He wanted a box and a hamper that was come from Newcastle - upon - Jyne.
sentences.cn: 他要领取由 泰因 新堡运来的一箱和一大篮货物.

sentences.en: I hastily packed the hamper and lugged it to the car.
sentences.cn: 我匆忙装好食品篮，吃力地把它拎上车子。

sentences.en: If you hands are nervous and cold, that will hamper the energies.
sentences.cn: 如果你的手是抖动和冰凉的, 就会妨碍能量流动.

sentences.en: No attempts to hamper me, or capture me!
sentences.cn: 别尽想来与我找麻烦或者抓住我!

sentences.en: On the other hand, moving persistent objects themselves can hamper navigation.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 移动持久对象本身可能妨碍导航.

sentences.en: Police should have the power to fine people who hamper rescue efforts. In fact I'd throw them into prison for a night.
sentences.cn: 警察应该有权对妨碍救援的人处以罚款。其实要是换了我，非关他们一宿不可。

sentences.en: Prejudice sometimes hamper a person from do the right thing.
sentences.cn: 偏见有时候妨害人做正确的事情.

sentences.en: She tried to run, but was hampered by her heavy suitcase.
sentences.cn: 她想跑，但沉重的旅行箱拖累了她。

sentences.en: The emergence of such problems seriously hamper the development of enterprises.
sentences.cn: 这些问题的出现严重阻碍了企业的发展.

sentences.en: There are some apples in a picnic hamper.
sentences.cn: 在野餐用的大篮子里有许多苹果.

sentences.en: What problems hamper the implementation of environmental regulations?
sentences.cn: 是什么问题阻止了对环保法规的履行?

trans.tran_cn: （有盖的）大篮子，阻碍物，足械，[航]船具
trans.tran_en: a basket with a lid, which is used for carrying food or sending it to someone as a present
to make it difficult for someone to do something
to make it difficult for someone to do something
